# @orkestrel/core

> Minimal, strongly-typed adapter/port toolkit for TypeScript. Compose capabilities with tokens, wire implementations via a tiny DI container, and drive lifecycles deterministically with an orchestrator.

This file contains links to all documentation sections following the llmstxt.org standard.

## Table of Contents

- [Orkestrel Core overview](https://orkestrel.github.io/core/guide/overview): # Orkestrel Core overview
- [Start](https://orkestrel.github.io/core/guide/start): # Start

- [Ecosystem](https://orkestrel.github.io/core/guide/ecosystem): # Ecosystem
